triples.name: Backstepping
triples.relevance: Backstepping provides the recursive control design framework that the paper enhances with predefined-time stability.

triples.name: Neural network (machine learning)
triples.relevance: Neural networks are used for approximating nonlinear functions and enabling adaptive control in the multiagent system.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Multiagent systems is the primary control problem addressed by the paper, with applications in vehicular platoons and teleoperation.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel adaptive neural control approach that adjusts to system parameters and unknown dynamics.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: Nonlinear control theory provides the mathematical foundation for handling the nonlinear multiagent systems.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: Control theory is the foundational discipline underlying the predefined-time control approach and feedback control design.
